name: Inputs w/ Interactive Components
description:
Use this to kick start your input fields in your next design project.


This input field component has 972 variants using the latest release of Auto Layout, and are built in a way that it is easy for you to add more if necessary.


Update - 3/29/21

  • Fixed an issue with linked icons


Update - 3/1/21

  • Added interactions using Figma's new interactive components feature
  • Fixed clipping issues where some focused states were clipped


Update - 2/26/21

  • Updated variants so that the text remains when swapping out the variant


Reach out to me on Twitter for questions or edit suggestions!


DM
